<?phpnamespace App\Services;use Redis;class LockService{    /**     * Redis     * */    protected $redis;    /**     * Token     * */    protected $token;    /**     * prefix     */    protected $prefix = 'redis-lock-';    /**     * value     * */    protected const VALUE = 1;    /**     * æœåŠ¡åˆå§‹åŒ–,å•æœºé”     * @param Redis|null $redis     */    public function __construct(Redis $redis = null)    {        $this->redis = $redis ?: $this->createRedis();    }    /**     * åˆ›å»º Redis å®ä¾‹     *     * @return Redis     */    protected function createRedis(): Redis    {        $redis = new Redis();        $redis->connect(config('database.redis.default.host'), config('database.redis.default.port'));        $redis->auth(config('database.redis.default.password'));        return $redis;    }    /**     * åŠ é”     *     * @param string $key     * @param int $ttl     * @param int $retry     * @return bool     */    public  function lock(string $key,int $ttl = 1,int $retry = 3) : bool    {        while (true) {            if ($this->redis->set($this->prefix . $key,self::VALUE, ['NX', 'EX' => $ttl]))            {                return true;            } elseif ($this->redis->ttl($this->prefix . $key) === -1) {                // ä»¥é˜²å‡ºç°æ­»é”                $this->redis->expire($this->prefix . $key,$ttl);            }            if ($retry-- <= 0) {                break;            }            usleep(10000);        }        return false;    }    /**     * è§£é”     *     * @param string $key     *     * @return bool     */    public function unlock(string $key) : bool    {        if($this->redis->get($this->prefix . $key)) {            $this->redis->multi();            $this->redis->del($this->prefix . $key);            $this->redis->exec();            return true;        } else {            return false;        }    }}

<?phpnamespace App\Console\Commands;use Illuminate\Console\Command;use App\Services\MultiProgressService;class BatchSearchTask extends Command{    /**     * The name and signature of the console command.     *     * @var string     */    protected $signature = 'batch:search        {--id=      : å½“å‰ç¼–å·}        {--max=     : æœ€å¤§çº¿ç¨‹}        ';    /**     * The console command description.     *     * @var string     */    protected $description = 'batch mode data search';    /**     * Create a new command instance.     *     * @return void     */    public function __construct()    {        parent::__construct();    }    /**     * Execute the console command.     *     * @return mixed     */    public function handle()    {        // åˆå§‹åŒ–è¿›ç¨‹        $service = new MultiProgressService(            $this->option('id') ?? 00,            $this->option('max') ?? 8        );        // å¼€å§‹ä»»åŠ¡        $service->start('search');    }}

<?phpnamespace App\Services;use Carbon\Carbon;use Webpatser\Uuid\Uuid;use Illuminate\Support\Facades\DB;use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Log;use App\Facades\UserBatchSearchNumber;use App\Facades\UserBatchSearchRecording;use App\Services\V1\Front\SingleModeService;class MultiProgressService{    /**     * ä»»åŠ¡ç¼–å·     *     * @var int     */    protected $id;        $this->max = $max;        $this->lock = new LockService();        $this->single = new SingleModeService();    }    /**     * å¼€å§‹ä»»åŠ¡     * @param string $drive     * @param int $ttl     * @return bool     */    public function start(string $drive = 'store',$ttl = 600) : bool    {        // è¶…è¿‡è§„å®šçš„è¿›ç¨‹æ•°ä¸åšä»»ä½•å¤„ç†å°±è¿”å›        if ($this->id >= $this->max) {              usleep(1000 * 1000);        try {            // åŠ é”æˆåŠŸè¿›å…¥é€»è¾‘æ‰§è¡Œ            if ($this->lock->lock($name,$ttl)) {                              $this->search();                $this->lock->unlock($name); // æ‰§è¡Œå®Œä¹‹åè§£é”            }        }catch (\Exception $e) {            Log::channel('task')->debug($drive,[                'line' => $e->getLine(),                'message' => $e->getMessage(),                'code' => $e->getCode(),                'file' => $e->getFile(),                'progress_id' => $this->id,                'max_progress_number' => $this->max,                'lock_name' => $name,                'is_unlock' => $this->lock->unlock($name)            ]); è¿™ä¹ˆå¤šè¿”å›ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œå­—ä½“é‡çš„æ˜¯é‡ç‚¹æ³¨æ„çš„åœ°æ–¹ï¼Œå°¤å…¶ï¼šæ€»è€—æ—¶ã€DNS æŸ¥è¯¢è€—æ—¶ã€ç­‰å¾…è¿æ¥è€—æ—¶ã€ä¸Šä¼ æ•°æ®çš„å¤§å°ã€‚

<?php          public function searchService(object $query)    {        $page  = request('page', 1);        $limit = request('limit', 20);        $query = $query::query();        if ($mobile = request('mobile'))        {            $query->where([                'mobile' => $mobile            ]);        }        if ($inviteMobile = request('invite_mobile'))        {            $query->where([                'id' => User::where([                    'mobile' => $inviteMobile                ])->select('id')->first()->id            ]);        }        if ($address = request('address'))        {            $query->where([                'address' => $address            ]);        }        if ($erhAddress = request('eth_address'))        {            $query->where([                'eth_address' => $erhAddress            ]);        }        if ($googleKey = request('google_key'))        {            $query->where([                'google_key' => $googleKey            ]);        }        if (in_array($googleStatus = request('google_status',3),[0,1]))        {            $query->where([                'google_status' => $googleStatus            ]);        }        if ($nickname = request('nickname'))        {            $query->where([                'nickname' => $nickname            ]);        }        if ($identity = request('user_identity'))        {            $query->where([                'user_identity' => $identity            ]);        }        if ($inviteCode = request('invite_code'))        {            $query->where([                'invite_code' => $inviteCode            ]);        }        if (in_array($status = request('status',3),[0,1]))        {            $query->where([                'status' => $status            ]);        }        if($time = request('created_at'))        {            $time = explode(' ',$time);            if (count($time) != 4) ApiExceptionError('æ—¥æœŸé”™è¯¯');            $endTime = $time[3] == '00:00:00' ? '23:59:59' : $time[3];            $query->whereDate('created_at','>=',$time[0])                ->whereDate('created_at','<=',$time[2])                ->whereTime('created_at','>=',$time[1])                ->whereTime('created_at','<=',$endTime);        }        ... æ­¤æ¬¡çœç•¥ N ä¸ª        return $query->paginate($limit, ['*'], 'page', $page)            ->toArray();    }

entry.content:
æ‘˜è¦

RSA åŠ å¯†æ˜¯ä¸€ç§éå¯¹ç§°åŠ å¯†ã€‚å¯ä»¥åœ¨ä¸ç›´æ¥ä¼ é€’å¯†é’¥çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œå®Œæˆè§£å¯†ã€‚è¿™èƒ½å¤Ÿç¡®ä¿ä¿¡æ¯çš„å®‰å…¨æ€§ï¼Œé¿å…äº†ç›´æ¥ä¼ é€’å¯†é’¥æ‰€é€ æˆçš„è¢«ç ´è§£çš„é£é™©ã€‚æ˜¯ç”±ä¸€å¯¹å¯†é’¥æ¥è¿›è¡ŒåŠ è§£å¯†çš„è¿‡ç¨‹ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«ç§°ä¸ºå…¬é’¥å’Œç§é’¥ã€‚ä¸¤è€…ä¹‹é—´æœ‰æ•°å­¦ç›¸å…³ï¼Œè¯¥åŠ å¯†ç®—æ³•çš„åŸç†å°±æ˜¯å¯¹ä¸€æå¤§æ•´æ•°åšå› æ•°åˆ†è§£çš„å›°éš¾æ€§æ¥ä¿è¯å®‰å…¨æ€§ã€‚é€šå¸¸ä¸ªäººä¿å­˜ç§é’¥ï¼Œå…¬é’¥æ˜¯å…¬å¼€çš„ï¼ˆå¯èƒ½åŒæ—¶å¤šäººæŒæœ‰ï¼‰ã€‚

ç”Ÿæˆå…¬é’¥ç§é’¥

Linux ç³»ç»Ÿéƒ½è‡ªå¸¦äº†opensslï¼Œwindows å¯èƒ½éœ€è¦å®‰è£… openssl ç”Ÿæˆå·¥å…·

# ç¬¬ä¸€æ­¥ï¼šç”Ÿæˆç§é’¥ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œæˆ‘ä»¬æŒ‡å®šç§é’¥çš„é•¿åº¦ä¸º1024, é•¿åº¦è¶Šé•¿ï¼ŒåŠ è§£å¯†æ¶ˆè€—çš„æ—¶é—´è¶Šé•¿openssl genrsa -out rsa_private_key.pem 1024# ç¬¬äºŒæ­¥ï¼šæ ¹æ®ç§é’¥ç”Ÿæˆå¯¹åº”çš„å…¬é’¥openssl rsa -in rsa_private_key.pem -pubout -out rsa_public_key.pub# ç¬¬ä¸‰æ­¥ï¼šç§é’¥è½¬åŒ–æˆpkcs8æ ¼å¼ï¼Œã€è¿™ä¸€æ­¥éå¿…é¡»ï¼Œåªæ˜¯ç¨‹åºè§£æèµ·æ¥æ–¹ä¾¿ã€‘openssl pkcs8 -topk8 -inform PEM -in rsa_private_key.pem -outform PEM -nocrypt -out rsa_private_key_pkcs8.pem

ä½¿ç”¨

RSA åªèƒ½åŠ å¯†æœ€é•¿ 117 ä½çš„æ•°æ®ã€‚

<?phpnamespace App\Services;class SignService{    protected $publicKey;    protected $privateKey;    /**     * åˆå§‹åŒ–     * */    public function __construct()    {        $this->publicKey  = openssl_get_publickey(file_get_contents('../rsa_public_key.pub'));        $this->privateKey = openssl_get_privatekey(file_get_contents('../rsa_private_key_pkcs8.pem'));    }    /**     * å…¬é’¥åŠ å¯†     * @param mixed $data     *     * @return string     */    function encrypt($data)    {        $encrypt = '';        foreach (str_split($data, 117) as $item)        {            $temp = '';            openssl_public_encrypt($item, $encrypt, $this->publicKey);            $encrypt .= $temp;        }        openssl_free_key($this->publicKey);        return base64_encode($encrypt);    }    /**     * ç§é’¥è§£å¯†     * @param mixed $data     *     * @return string     */    function decrypt($data)    {        $data    = base64_decode($data);        $decrypt = '';        foreach (str_split($data, 128) as $item)        {            $temp = '';            openssl_private_decrypt($item, $temp, $this->privateKey);            $decrypt .= $temp;        }        openssl_free_key($this->privateKey);        return $decrypt;    }    /**     * ç§é’¥ç”Ÿæˆç­¾å     * @param mixed $data     *     * @return string     */    function sign($data)    {        $signature = config('app.signature');        openssl_sign($data, $signature, $this->privateKey);        openssl_free_key($this->privateKey);        return base64_encode($signature);    }    /**     * å…¬é’¥éªŒè¯     * @param mixed $data     * @param mixed $sign     *     * @return bool     */    function veritySign($data,$sign)    {        $result = openssl_verify($data, base64_decode($sign), $this->publicKey);        openssl_free_key($this->publicKey);        return (bool)$result;    }}
